attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the voters request that the government scraps the current extradition treaty between the UK and the USA which we believe to be unfair, one-sided and unjust.

Ross Hemsworth
Journalist

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the US/UK extradition treaty."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18675


Prime Minister's Office
